layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#CCCCCC]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 188x28 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 186x26
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 186x22
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 66x22 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 62x18
                text run at (2,2) width 62: "appName"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (70,2) size 114x22 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 110x18
                text run at (2,2) width 63: "Netscape "
                text run at (64,2) width 48: "rules!!!"
